comment: Good morning, fellow Gabbers. Today I ask you to celebrate with me my good news. It truly is a momentous occasion. After waiting a year for an appointment from my local hospital, it's finally arrived!!! One can only hope my vision hasn't permanently deteriorated too much during this time Joyous cheers all round from Chez Deb's.
